name: let me out (itch) (minze_melone)
description:
A platformer about pink-haired girl.

Features:

*You can make your own levels right in text-editor (instructions are provided)

*40 soundtracks

*different jump heights

*pixel-perfect collision detection

*pixel-art style

*fullscreen mode - the future is now

*zoom in/out, toggle player following

*small size

For now the game has 10 levels. If you would like to contribute - you can send yours to tezul@yahoo.com and i will add them to the game. You can also share your levels in the comment section.
